```php
blog_article_by_id:
    path:      /blog/article/{page}
    controller: BlogBundle\Controller\BlogController:articleAction
    requirements:
      path: '.*?'
      page: '\d+'
blog_article_by_slug:
    path:      /blog/article/{page}
    controller: BlogBundle\Controller\BlogController:articleAction
    requirements:
      path: '.*?'
      page: '[\w-]+'
```
